div.pre: 1968 Scandale, 15 km. WNW of Croton, Bruttium, 1959 Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 1 EL, 10 AR Caulonia: 1 st. Syracuse: 1 EL (Apollo/tripod) Anactorium: 3 Pegasi (1 ΝΑϒ fillet; 2 ΔΩ altar) Argos: 4 Pegasi (2 spear; 2 ΔΙ shield) Thyrrheium: 1 Pegasus (earring symbol) Unc.: 1 Pegasus Disposition: Reggio Listed by K in 1969; all coins very worn
